pullrequest.title: new robot configuration with two cameras for X1, X2 and X4

content.raw:
Thanks.   
We are making progress by using this configuration for our approach to reach the qualification criteria. We think this alternative makes sense because a second camera should be cheaper than a Lidar.
content.html:
Thanks.
